name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shoot Em All - Shoot or Die

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Shoot Em All - Shoot or Die: A fun space shooter game where you defend against incoming enemies
short.de: Shoot Em All - Shoot or Die: Ein unterhaltsames Weltraum-Shooter-Spiel, in dem du dich gegen ankommende Feinde verteidigst
short.es: Shoot Em All - Shoot or Die: Un divertido juego de disparos espaciales donde te defiendes contra enemigos entrantes
short.fr: Shoot Em All - Shoot or Die: Un jeu de tir spatial amusant où vous vous défendez contre les ennemis
short.it: Shoot Em All - Shoot or Die: Un divertente gioco sparatutto spaziale dove ti difendi dai nemici in arrivo
short.ja: Shoot Em All - Shoot or Die: 迫り来る敵から身を守る楽しいスペースシューティングゲーム
short.ko: Shoot Em All - Shoot or Die: 다가오는 적들로부터 방어하는 재미있는 우주 슈팅 게임
short.ru: Shoot Em All - Shoot or Die: Увлекательная космическая стрелялка, где вы защищаетесь от наступающих врагов
short.tr: Shoot Em All - Shoot or Die: Gelen düşmanlara karşı savunma yaptığınız eğlenceli bir uzay oyunu
short.zh_CN: Shoot Em All - Shoot or Die: 一个有趣的太空射击游戏，您需要防御来袭的敌人

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🎮 Shoot Em All - Shoot or Die Play Game

Experience the thrill of space combat in this action-packed shooter game! Defend yourself against waves of enemies, collect power-ups, and upgrade your ship to become the ultimate space warrior.

✨ Key Features:
• 🎯 Simple and intuitive mouse controls
• 🛡️ Multiple character types with unique abilities
• 💫 Various power-ups and special effects
• 🏆 Global high score system
• 🎨 Customizable ships and bullets
• 🌍 Supports 15 different languages
• 🎵 Dynamic sound effects
• 🏪 In-game shop with upgrades

🎲 How to Play:
1. 🖱️ Move your mouse to aim
2. 🔫 Click to shoot enemies
3. ⚡ Collect power-ups for special abilities
4. 💰 Earn coins to buy upgrades
5. 🛡️ Use shields and power-ups strategically
6. 🏆 Try to achieve the highest score!

🎁 Power-ups Include:
• ⚡ Speed Boost
• ✦ Double Shot
• ❋ Shield
• ×2 Score Multiplier

🌟 Perfect for:
• Quick gaming sessions
• Competitive players
• Arcade game lovers
• Space shooter enthusiasts

Download now and join the space battle! Can you survive the endless waves of enemies? 🚀
